entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
